meanings.definition: A benign tumor composed of fibrous or connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that fibromas are non-cancerous growths.
meanings.sent2: She had surgery to remove the fibromas from her arm.
meanings.sent3: The fibromas in the garden seemed to be growing faster than the flowers!
meanings.sent4: The fibromas on the old building were like stubborn reminders of the past.
meanings.sent5: The fibromas felt like small lumps under the skin.
